item.title: More than 40 dead after multi-vehicle crash in Uganda
item.description: The crash involved two buses, a lorry and a car, police say, with many also injured.

item.title: Children among victims in Russian air strikes, hours after Trump-Putin talks shelved
item.description: The drone and missile attacks on Ukraine came as the US president put on hold his plans for an imminent summit in Budapest.

item.title: Louvre reopens three days after French crown jewels stolen
item.description: The world's most-visited museum shut its doors after jewels worth tens of millions were stolen on Sunday.

item.title: Mosquitoes found in Iceland for first time after record heat
item.description: Previously the country was one of the world's only mosquito-free zones.

item.title: 'We fear for our souls' - Nigerian farmers need armed guards to protect them from jihadists
item.description: Armed guards and special buses are increasingly used to coax terrified farmers back into growing food.
